entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 p.m. MST Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 4:00 PM MST Saturday 29 April 2023
Temperature: 4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 58 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: SSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Occasional drifting snow. Wind becoming east 30 km/h this evening except 50 near the Richardson mountains overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 3 except high plus 2 over southern sections.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. 70 percent chance of light snow over southern sections in the morning. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h except 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 3 except high plus 2 over southern sections. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 29 April 2023
